programme.title: Alligator
programme.desc: A flushed baby alligator survives on hormone-filled lab rats, grows giant, and unleashes chaos in Chicago.

programme.title: Black Christmas
programme.desc: During their Christmas break, a group of sorority girls are stalked by a stranger.

programme.title: The Convent
programme.desc: A group of college students breaks into an abandoned convent, only to discover that it's inhabited by demons.

programme.title: Day of the Dead 2: Contagium
programme.desc: In 1968, in the Ravenside Military Hospital in a military facility in Pennsylvania, the army loses control of an experiment of a lethal bacteriologic weapon that changes the DNA and transforms human beings into zombies.

programme.title: Body Bags
programme.desc: A creepy-looking coroner (John Carpenter) introduces three different horror tales involving his current work which are cadavers in "body bags".

programme.title: Horror Bites
programme.desc: Small tales, big terror... In this Horror Bites marathon, bite-sized stories deliver spine-chilling scares in under 20 minutes. From twisted encounters to nightmarish twists, these short horrors pack a punch, proving that sometimes the scariest tales come in small doses.

programme.title: The Little Shop of Horrors
programme.desc: A clumsy young man nurtures a plant and discovers that it's carnivorous, forcing him to kill to feed it.

programme.title: Eat Brains Love
programme.desc: When Jake and his dream girl, Amanda, contract a mysterious zombie virus, they end up on the run from Cass, a teen psychic sent by the government's top-secret Necrotic Control Division to track them down as they search for a cure.

programme.title: The Slumber Party Massacre II
programme.desc: A teen and her friends are terrorized by a rock star whose guitar is fitted with a drill bit.

programme.title: Amityville: The Evil Escapes
programme.desc: The demonic forces that were lurking in Amityville escape to California by inhabiting a lamp.

programme.title: The Invitation
programme.desc: In this taut psychological thriller by Karyn Kusama, the tension is palpable when Will shows up to his ex-wife Eden and new husband David's dinner party.

programme.title: Sleepaway Camp
programme.desc: After a terrible boating accident killed her family, shy Angela Baker is sent to Camp Arawak where a series of bizarre and violent �accidents� occur.

programme.title: Grizzly
programme.desc: An 18-foot killer grizzly terrorizes a state park, leaving it up to a park ranger to stop the slaughter.

programme.title: Piranha
programme.desc: When flesh-eating piranhas are accidentally released into a resort's rivers, the guests become their next meal.
